name: Ground Control
description:
Ground Control is a strategy game developed by Massive Entertainment. It was originally released in 2000. Sierra On-Line published the game. Ground Control has a Metascore of 86, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Ground Control is available on PC.
Jeff Pobst produced the game. It was directed by Martin Walfisz and Mats Grahm. Ola Strandh scored the game.
